column1: We were grossed out by the melted ice-cream at the end. The rest were great but I love dessert so I would rate it 5 out of 10.
On a positive note, our server was very attentive. But then the main meal come out very late. We have to wait for thirteen minutes.
The burgers are terrific. Cannot complain 'cause cheese makes me happy. Me and my friends order half of the set.
The only thing I did like was the prime rib and dessert section.
I wonder if Yelp menu have ever changed. They repeatly serve the same foods and drinks.
